thread.section_title: Le Marceau Bastille Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Clean & Central
thread.title_full: Clean & Central - Review of Le Marceau Bastille Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: LauraRundle
title: Clean & Central
text:
Friendly staff and clean rooms. In a quiet part of Paris but very easy to get to the centre on the metro.
They let us leave our bags in their cloak room as we arrived before the check in time and so we could go out for the day and we could leave them there after we checked out! Very handy.
We didn't eat in the hotel so not sure what the food was like.
